thread.section_title: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly and Beautiful
thread.title_full: Friendly and Beautiful - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 281EileenB
title: Friendly and Beautiful
text:
This hotel is beautiful and very clean with extra friendly and efficient staff.There is a rooftop bar with great views. There is a restaurant in the lobby that is excellent, I can't remember when I had suck a great steak. It is located in the heart of the theaters. I highly recommend this hotel
Green Features: They do offer a wastebasket for recycling, which is part of the regular wastebasket
